sections.heading: Acting
sections.text:
as broker, dealer, commission merchant or agent without license prohibited;

license not required for cash buyer or agent of cash buyer.

sections.heading: Application
sections.text:
for license: Contents; additional requirements for agents; appointment of

Director as attorney upon whom process may be served. [Effective until the date

of the repeal of 42 U.S.C. � 666, the federal law requiring each state to

establish procedures for withholding, suspending and restricting the

professional, occupational and recreational licenses for child support

arrearages and for noncompliance with certain processes relating to paternity

or child support proceedings.]

sections.heading: Additional
sections.text:
requirements for issuance and renewal of license: Statement regarding

obligation of child support; grounds for denial of license; duty of Department.

[Effective until the date of the repeal of 42 U.S.C. � 666, the federal law

requiring each state to establish procedures for withholding, suspending and

restricting the professional, occupational and recreational licenses for child

support arrearages and for noncompliance with certain processes relating to

paternity or child support proceedings.]

sections.heading: Previous
sections.text:
convictions and violations by applicant may be considered as adverse showing of

character, responsibility and good faith; rejection of application for certain

period after date of adjudication for bankruptcy or collection by court order.

sections.heading: Petition
sections.text:
to review criminal history to determine if criminal history disqualifies

applicant.

sections.heading: Bonds
sections.text: and other security; penalty for selling or encumbering security for bond.

sections.heading: Civil
sections.text:
action for violation of chapter or misrepresentation or fraud; limitation of

actions; service of process.

sections.heading: Retention
sections.text: of money or securities deposited in lieu of bond after operations cease.

sections.heading: Revocation
sections.text: for default; publication of notice of revocation.

sections.text: license fee.

of applicant; issuance of license. [Effective until the date of the repeal of

sections.text:
for renewal of license required to include information relating to state

sections.heading: Investigation
sections.text: of transactions involving farm products.

sections.heading: Grounds
sections.text:
for refusing to grant or renew or for suspension or revocation of license;

sections.heading: Mandatory
sections.text:
suspension of license for failure to pay child support or comply with certain

subpoenas or warrants; reinstatement of license. [Effective until the date of

the repeal of 42 U.S.C. � 666, the federal law requiring each state to

establish procedures for withholding, suspending and restricting the

professional, occupational and recreational licenses for child support

arrearages and for noncompliance with certain processes relating to paternity

or child support proceedings.]

sections.heading: Records
sections.text: of commission merchants, dealers and brokers.

sections.heading: Accounting
sections.text:
and remittances by commission merchants; records of sales; payments by dealers;

penalties for nonpayment.

sections.heading: Cargo
sections.text:
manifests required to be carried on motor vehicles operated by dealers and

commission merchants; suspension or cancellation of license for false

statements on manifest.

sections.heading: Certification
sections.text:
as actual producer of certain farm products: Regulations of Department; fees

for certification; exemption from certain taxes and fees.

sections.heading: Registration
sections.text:
as produce vendor; regulations; exception for person certified as actual

producer of farm products.

sections.text: livestock: Permit required; regulations of State Board of Agriculture.

sections.text: livestock: Recapture of escaped livestock; impoundment; liability of owner.
